casebody.data:
Cologro PIAZZA, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Appellee. No. 4793. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. July 14, 1932. Frederic M. P. Pearse, of Newark, N. J., for appellant. Phillip Forman, U. S. Atty., and John W. Griggs, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Trenton, N. J., for appellee.

Before BUFFINGTON, WOOLLEY, and DAVIS, Circuit Judges.

PEE CURIAM.

The facts in this ease bring it clearly within the case of Miller v. United States (C. C. A.) 50 F.(2d) 505. Finding no error, the judgment below is affirmed.
